title: Miss Congeniality
creator_credit: Donald Petrie, Marc Lawrence, Sandra Bullock, Fortis Film and Castle Rock Entertainment
brief_description: FBI special agent Gracie Hart is a man’s woman - she chews with her mouth open, snorts when she laughs, has one eyebrow and is having a “bad hair decade”…So when the FBI needs to send an undercover agent into the famed Miss United States Pageant, Agent Hart certainly isn’t their first choice, she’s their only choice. Cast includes: Sandra Bullock, Michael Caine, William Shatner, Candice Bergen, Benjamin Bratt.
